evidence.source_document: United States' Motion for a Preliminary Injunction Against Denka Performance Elastomer
evidence.text: The United States’ Motion for a Preliminary Injunction... requests the Court enter the Proposed Preliminary Injunction Order attached as 'Exhibit A' to the accompanying memorandum of law.
Docket entry: 2023-05-02 | MOTION to Dismiss for Failure to State a Claim... (Attachments: #1 Memorandum in Support, #2 Exhibit A, #3 Notice of Submission)
